eu.tivian.musico.net

Class Discogs

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.musico.net.Service
      • eu.tivian.musico.net.Discogs

  • public final class Discogs
extends Service
    Provides base information about albums, including the album artworks.
    See Also:
    Discogs API reference

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Discogs.EntryType
      Available types of entries supported by query function.
      private static class  Discogs.InstanceHolder
      Helper class to ensure thread-safe singleton creation.
      static class  Discogs.Query
      Helps to construct query string for the search function.
      static class  Discogs.SearchResult
      Single search entry.

      Fields

      Header format used for the authorization.
      private static String BARCODE_REGEX
      Regular expression used to validate if string is a valid EAN-13 or UPC-A barcode.
      private static String ROOT_URL
      Base URL for the Discogs API.
      private static String USER_AGENT
      The Discord API requires the request to include valid user-agent which reflects the application name.

        action - functor determining what should happen with received data.
        onError - functor called only if any I/O errors occurred while retrieving information from the server.
